topic.title: List-like Bracketings of Related Text Passages

body.p: Bracketings can occur in text structures that do not represent genuine lists. Nevertheless, the combined text segments themselves have a list-like structure. They are therefore also treated as lists within the higher-level structure.

example.title: Encoding of List-like Bracketings in the Text (1)
